content.rendered:
Summer 2018 Deals

Planning your summer vacation in the Rockies?  We’ve put together some deals to hook you early planners up.  Come adventure with us!


Now offering 20% off overnight rafting trips.  What better way to spend your vacation than with AVA?  Cruise the whitewater, enjoy a delicious dinner and camp alongside the river, then get back in the water the next morning!  Our overnight trips are perfect for a family outing or a great bonding experience for you and your buddies.

Want something more family-friendly?  Check out 24 Hours on the Upper Colorado to enjoy some beautiful scenery and cliff jump into the Colorado River.  For the more hardcore crew, our 3 Day Mild to Wild trip will be right up your alley.  Finishing up with about 35 miles of river travel and a mountaintop zipline tour, this is the best deal for those seeking adventure next summer!

Other valid trips for this deal include 24 Hours in Browns Canyon, 24 Hours in Browns Canyon Deluxe, 2 Day Advanced, 2 Day Advanced Deluxe, 3 Day Mild to Wild Deluxe, and 3 Days on the Upper Colorado River.

Use promo code CAMPOUT20 to redeem.

We also have a great deal on the ultimate package: rafting & ziplining… back to back!

 

Get 50% off the rafting portion of this combo and take on a day of adventure!  Start your morning on whitewater and end flying high over Colorado’s Rockies.

Check out the Browns Canyon 1/2 Day or the Browns Canyon Express + Zipline packages; maybe the Numbers 1/2 Day + Zipline mixture will suit your party better.  Either way, this is a deal you definitely do not want to miss out on.

Use promo code 50RAFT18 to redeem.

*50% off Rafting portion of Rafting & Zipline packages not available on 2-day lodging packages or overnight trips.  Neither deal can be combined with any other offer.
